dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SJ 74 IS: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration relating to “Pipeline Safety: Editorial Change To Reflect the Name Change of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Whitehouse introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration relating to Pipeline Safety: Editorial Change To Reflect the Name Change of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration relating to Pipeline Safety: Editorial Change To Reflect the Name Change of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America (90 Fed. Reg. 21434 (May 20, 2025)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
